channel.title: Adding items
channel.description: im tryin to add new items in and ive added it to the clients items and put in the new sprite but when i try to run my client it gets to media and stops was wondering if someone could help me with this via IM ireallyhate@live.com

item.title: Adding items
item.dc:creator: @Pompano21 Pompano21
item.description:
@Pompano21 wrote:

[quote=“dedblu2005@hotmail.com, post:6, topic:374605”]to add a “new” item only requires 4 edits 2 client 2 server
client 1 items.rscd needs to have the new item added
client 2 animations needs to have new item added (i still have problems with this [curently looking in to it])
server 1 items.xml needs the same edts as items.rscd (client)
server 2 itemswieldable.xml needs new item added so u can equip it

if your missing any of the steps shown here then thats why your crashing[/quote]

You need to change sprite id in itemwieldable and then add to animation the new item for wielding colour.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items
item.dc:creator: @dedblu2005 dedblu2005@hotmail.com
item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

to add a “new” item requires 4 edits: 2 client 2 server (more may be required im still working on it)
client 1. items.rscd needs to have the new item added
client 2. animations needs to have new item added (i still have problems with this [curently looking in to it])
server 1. items.xml needs the same edts as items.rscd (client)
server 2. itemswieldable.xml needs new item added so u can equip it

if your missing any of the steps shown here then thats why your crashing

Read full topic

item.title: Adding items
item.dc:creator: @masterpowers masterpowers
item.description:
@masterpowers wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:4, topic:374605”][quote author=masterpowers link=topic=470570.msg3442863#msg3442863 date=1293185587]
its an animated 1 and ive set everything right but when i go to login it freezes my client
[/quote]

I see, I quess we can’t help you then, because you already set everything right[/quote]

thats a dicks answer but either way i put in the sprites n shit in the animations then items(server and client side) and wieldabledef and i get this problem i cant figure it out

Read full topic
